channel.title: Avatar
channel.description:
Avatar was a small private project last year, it wasn't ever really publically know and very few people actually have the source, it was an attempt to make a winterlove server better. although it uses ass backwards methods it did in fact come out a lot cleaner than what everyone uses today. i figured i would post it here so you guys could check it out. i wouldn't recommend using it though
http://dnd.no-ip.org/avatar.rar

item.title: Avatar
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“marluxia, post:6, topic:114401”]I’ll just leave this here for archival reasons :))))))), incase anyone still wants it. sry about the bump[/quote]As long as this is ‘bumped’, I might just add:

“Whoah what up with the fked up indentations in Core/”. But hey, it might’ve just been the IDE (doubt it).

Read full topic
